sqlMap.insert: insert into jd_product_sku_info ( skusn, xiucode, stocknum, colorname, sizevalue, attributes, ismain, skuImagePath, num, jdWareJd )values( #skusn#, #xiucode#, #stocknum#, #colorname#, #sizevalue#, #attributes#, #ismain#, #skuImagePath#, #num#, #jdWareJd# )

insert into jd_product_sku_info ( skusn, xiucode, stocknum, colorname, sizevalue, attributes, ismain, skuImagePath, num, jdWareJd, jdskuid )values( #skusn#, #xiucode#, #stocknum#, #colorname#, #sizevalue#, #attributes#, #ismain#, #skuImagePath#, #num#, #jdWareJd#, #jdSkuId# )
sqlMap.select: select * from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where t.xiucode = #xiucode# and t.stocknum >0 order by t.attributes desc,t.skusn asc
select * from xiu_jd.jd_product_sku_info t where t.xiucode = #xiucode# and t.stocknum >0 order by t.attributes desc,t.skusn asc
select * from xiu_ebay_jd.jd_product_sku_info t where t.xiucode = #xiucode# and t.stocknum >0 order by t.attributes desc,t.skusn asc
sqlMap.delete: delete from jd_product_sku_info t where t.jdWareJd=#wareId#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where t.skusn =#skusn#
sqlMap.update: update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t set t.stocknum=#stocknum# where t.skusn=#skusn#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where t.xiucode in
#value[]#

delete from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where 1=1 and t.xiucode in
#xiuCodes[]#
t.jdWareJd=#jdWareJd#
t.skusn=#skuSN#
t.jdskuid=#jdskuId#
sqlMap.select: select distinct t.aid || ':' || t.vid attr from xiu_jd_bag.jd_attributevalue t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_attribute w on t.aid = w.aid where w.cid=#jdCid# and t.cid=#jdCid# and t.name=#attrValue# and w.IS_SALE_PROP=1 and rownum =1

select distinct t.aid || ':' || t.vid attr from xiu_jd.jd_attributevalue t left join xiu_jd.jd_attribute w on t.aid = w.aid where w.cid=#jdCid# and t.cid=#jdCid# and t.name=#attrValue# and w.IS_SALE_PROP=1 and rownum =1

select distinct t.aid || ':' || t.vid attr from xiu_ebay_jd.jd_attributevalue t left join xiu_ebay_jd.jd_attribute w on t.aid = w.aid where w.cid=#jdCid# and t.cid=#jdCid# and t.name=#attrValue# and w.IS_SALE_PROP=1 and rownum =1
sqlMap.update:
update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t
t.attributes = #attributes#
t.colorname=#colorname#
t.sizevalue=#sizevalue#
t.status=#status#
t.jdWareJd=#jdWareJd#
t.jdskuid=#jdSkuId#
where t.skusn=#skusn#

update xiu_jd.jd_product_sku_info t
t.attributes = #attributes#
t.colorname=#colorname#
t.sizevalue=#sizevalue#
t.status=#status#
t.jdWareJd=#jdWareJd#
t.jdskuid=#jdSkuId#
where t.skusn=#skusn#

update xiu_ebay_jd.jd_product_sku_info t
t.attributes = #attributes#
t.colorname=#colorname#
t.sizevalue=#sizevalue#
t.status=#status#
t.jdWareJd=#jdWareJd#
t.jdskuid=#jdSkuId#
where t.skusn=#skusn#

update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t
t.attributes = #attributes#
t.colorname=#colorname#
t.sizevalue=#sizevalue#
t.status=#status#
t.jdWareJd=#jdWareJd#
t.jdskuid=#jdSkuId#
t.stocknum=#stocknum#
where t.skusn=#skusn#
sqlMap.select: select t.attributes from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where t.skusn=#outerId# and rownum=1

select t.attributes attributes, t.skuimagepath skuImagePath, w.jd_ware_id wareId, t.xiucode xiucode, t.skusn skusn from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info w on w.xiucode = t.xiucode where w.status =1 and t.status=0 or t.status =2
sqlMap.update: update xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t set t.status = #status# where t.skusn=#skusn#
sqlMap.select: select to_char(t.product_create,'yyyyMMdd') from xiu_goods.x_data_prd_info t where t.product_sn = #xiucode#

select distinct w.jdcolor from (select t.JDFIRSTCNAME||t.jdsecondCName|| t.jdthreecname names,t.* from xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_color t where t.xiucolor=#xiuColor#
) w join (select t1.name||t2.name|| t3.name names from jd_category t1 left join jd_category t2 on t1.id = t2.fid left join jd_category t3 on t2.id = t3.fid where t3.id=#jdCid#) m on w.names = m.names where rownum=1

select distinct w.jdsize from (select t.JDFIRSTCNAME||t.jdsecondCName|| t.jdthreecname names,t.* from xiu_jd_bag.jd_xiu_size t where t.xiusize=#xiuSize#
) w join (select t1.name||t2.name || t3.name names from jd_category t1 left join jd_category t2 on t1.id = t2.fid left join jd_category t3 on t2.id = t3.fid where t3.id=#jdCid# ) m on w.names = m.names where rownum=1

select count(1) from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info w on w.xiucode = t.xiucode where 1=1
w.jd_ware_id =#jdWareId#
select t.name from xiu_jd_bag.jd_attribute t where t.aid=#jdAttrName# and t.is_sale_prop =1

select t.skusn skusn, t.xiucode xiucode, t.stocknum stocknum, t.jdWareJd jdWareJd, t.jdSkuId jdSkuId from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info t where 1=1
t.skusn = #skuCode#

select k.skusn skusn, k.xiucode xiucode, k.attributes attributes, t.jd_ware_id jdWareJd from xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_info t left join xiu_jd_bag.jd_product_sku_info k on t.xiucode=k.xiucode where 1=1 and t.jd_ware_id=#jdWareId#
